DOC.criteria: Good health determine medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , vital sign , laboratory assessment Body weight : 60‐100 kg ( desirable ) Use medication consider acceptable clinical investigator 14‐day period start study ( Day 1 ) ; Donation unit blood participation study investigational market drug 30‐day period start study ( Day 1 ) ; If female , childbearing potential lactating ; History significant reaction fibrate lipid‐lowering agent ; Significant urine collection drug could interfere study
